sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Creates a purchase order in SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for the SAP S/4HANA – RFC spoke.
  • PO Header - Complex object containing these fields:
    • Purchasing Document
    • Company Code
    • Purchasing Doc. Type
    • Deletion indicator
    • Status
    • Created On
    • Created By
    • Item Number Interval
    • Vendor [ VENDOR ]
    • Language Key
    • ISO code for language key
    • Terms of Payment
    • Payment In [ DSCNT1_TO ]
    • Payment In [ DSCNT2_TO ]
    • Payment In [ DSCNT3_TO ]
    • Disc.percent 1
    • Disc.percent 2
    • Purch. Organization
    • Purchasing Group
    • Currency
    • ISO code currency
    • Exchange Rate
    • Exchange Rate Fixed
    • Document Date
    • Validity Per. Start
    • Validity Period End
    • Warranty
    • Quotation
    • Quotation Date
    • Your Reference
    • Salesperson
    • Telephone
    • Supplying Vendor
    • Customer
    • Outline agreement
    • GR Message
    • Supplying Plant
    • Incoterms
    • Incoterms (Part 2)
    • Collective Number
    • Invoicing Party
    • Our Reference
    • Logical System
    • Subitem Interval
    • Release indicator
    • Release State
    • Country sls.tax no.
    • ISO country tax
    • Reason for Canc.
    • Reason Code
    • Retention
    • Retention in Percent
    • Down Payment
    • Down Payment Amt in BAPI
    • Down Payt Percentage
    • Due Date for Down Payment
    • Incomplete
    • Incompleteness
    • Shipping type
    • Handover Location
    • Shipping Conditions
    • Incoterms Version
    • Incoterms Location 1
    • Incoterms Location 2
  • Purchase Order Items - List of objects containing these fields:
    • PO Item Number
    • Deletion indicator
    • Short Text
    • Material [ MATERIAL ]
    • Material Number [ MATERIAL_EXTERNAL ]
    • GUID (External) [ MATERIAL
    • Version Number [ MATERIAL_VERSION ]
    • Material [ EMATERIAL ]
    • Material Number [ EMATERIAL_EXTERNAL ]
    • GUID (External) [ EMATERIAL_GUID ]
    • Version Number [ EMATERIAL_VERSION ]
    • Plant
    • Storage Location
    • Tracking Number
    • Material Group
    • Purchasing info rec.
    • Vendor Material No
    • Order Quantity
    • Order Unit
    • Order unit in ISO
    • Order Price Unit
    • Order price unit ISO
    • Quantity Conversion [ CONV_NUM1 ]
    • Quantity Conversion [ CONV_DEN1 ]
    • Currency amount in BAPI interfaces
    • Price unit
    • GR processing time
    • Tax Code
    • Settlement Group 1
    • Stock Type
    • Info Record Update
    • Print Price
    • Estimated Price
    • 1st Reminder/Exped.
    • 2nd Reminder/Exped.
    • 3rd Reminder/Exped.
    • Overdeliv. Tolerance
    • Unltd Overdelivery
    • Underdel. Tolerance
    • Valuation Type
    • Delivery Completed
    • Final Invoice
    • Item category
    • Acct Assignment Cat.
    • Distribut. indicator
    • Partial invoice
    • Goods receipt
    • GR non-valuated
    • Invoice receipt
    • Free of Charge
    • GR-Based Inv. Verif.
    • Acknowledgment Reqd
    • Order Acknowledgment
    • Outline agreement
    • Princ.agreement item
    • Shipping Instr.
    • Customer
    • Condition Group
    • No Cash Discount
    • Planned Deliv. Time
    • Net Weight
    • Unit of Weight
    • ISO code
    • Tax Jurisdiction
    • QM Control Key
    • Confirmation Control
    • Revision level
    • Fund
    • Funds center
    • Commitment item
    • Pricing Date Control
    • Price Date
    • Gross Weight
    • Volume
    • Volume Unit
    • Volume unit ISO
    • Incoterms
    • Incoterms (Part 2)
    • Prior Vendor
    • Vendor Subrange
    • Higher-Level Item
    • Latest GR Date
    • Vendor [ SUPP_VENDOR ]
    • SC vendor
    • Kanban Indicator
    • Eval. receipt sett.
    • Promotion
    • Points
    • Points unit
    • ISO code
    • Season
    • Season Year
    • Settlement Group 2
    • Settlement Group 3
    • Subseq. Settlement
    • Min. Rem. Shelf Life
    • RFQ
    • Item [ RFQ_ITEM ]
    • Purchase Requisition
    • Item of requisition
    • Reference Document
    • Reference item
    • Subitem Category
    • Returns Item
    • Alloc.-Tab.-Relevant
    • Reason for Ordering
    • NCM Code
    • Material usage
    • Material origin
    • Produced in-house
    • Mat. CFOP category
    • Inflation Index
    • Inflation index date
    • Final Delivery
    • Partial Deliv./Item
    • Shipping block
    • Requisitioner
    • Period Ind. for SLED
    • Internal object no.
    • Package number
    • Batch
    • Vendor Batch
    • Pricing type
    • Grant
    • Commitment item
    • Functional Area
    • No Rounding
    • Price Adoption
    • Issuing Storage Loc.
    • Service-Based Invoice Verification
    • Earmarked funds
    • Document item
    • Origin Acceptance
    • Allocation Table
    • Allocation Item
    • Source Stor. Loc. Stock Type
    • REASON_REJ
    • CRM Sales Order
    • CRM Item No
    • CRM Ref Order
    • CRM Rf Item No
    • Requirement Urgency
    • Requirement Priority
    • Reason Code
    • Fund
    • Configurable Item Number
    • External Sort Number
    • Ext.Hierarchy Category
    • Retention in Percent
    • Down Payment
    • Down Payment Amt in BAPI
    • Down Payt Percentage
    • Due Date for Down Payment
    • Document No. External Doc.
    • External Item Number
    • Logical System
    • Central Contract
    • Central Contract Item
    • Budget Period
    • Blocking Reason - ID
    • Blocking Reason Text
    • Billing Relevance CRM
    • Fixed Date and Qty
    • GI-based goods rcpt
    • Shipping type
    • Handover Location
    • Tax Code Automatically Determined
    • Manual Tax Code Reason
    • Tax Incentive Type
    • Incentive ID
    • Tax Subject to Substituição Tributária
    • Requirement Segment
    • Stock Segment
    • Origin Jurisd. Code
    • Incoterms Location 1
    • Incoterms Location 2
    • Material [ MATERIAL_LONG ]
    • Material [ EMATERIAL_LONG ]
  • PO Accounts - List of objects containing these fields:
    • PO Item Number
    • Seq. No. of Account Assgt
    • Quantity
    • G/L Account
    • Business Area
    • Cost Center
    • Sales Document
    • Sales Document Item
    • Schedule Line Number
    • Asset
    • Order
    • Controlling Area
    • Cost Object
    • Profit Center
    • WBS element
  • Addresses For Inward Delivery - List of objects containing these fields:
    • PO Item Number
    • Address Number
    • Name
    • C/O name
    • City
    • District
    • Postal Code
    • PO Box
    • Street
    • Building code
    • Floor
    • Country Key
    • Region
    • Telephone
  • Purchase Order Schedule - List of objects containing these fields:
    • PO Item Number
    • Schedule line number
    • Deliv. date category
    • Delivery Date
    • Scheduled Quantity
    • Time
    • Stat.-Rel. Del. Date
    • Purchase Requisition
    • Item of requisition
    • Purchase Order Date
    • Route Schedule
    • Material Avail. Date
    • Matl Staging Time
    • Loading Date
    • Loading Time
    • Transptn Plang Date
    • Transp. Plan. Time
    • Goods Issue Date
    • Goods Issue Time
    • Deletion indicator
    • Closed
    • Goods Receipt End Date
    • Goods Receipt End Time
    • Committed Quantity
    • Committed date
    • Geographical Route
    • Handover Date
    • Handover Time
  • Additional Fields - Additional fields or values you want to add to the details. These fields are retrieved dynamically from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Outputs :

  • Purchase Order Data - Purchase order document details.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP S/4HANA - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error as returned from SAP S/4HANA - RFC in the RETURN object. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

 

To use this action, the corresponding SAP S/4HANA - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP_S4HANA_RFC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Create Purchase Order

Creates a purchase order in SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for the SAP S/4HANA – RFC spoke.
  • PO Header - Complex object containing these fields:
    • Purchasing Document
    • Company Code

    • PO Item Number
    • Seq. No. of Account Assgt

    • PO Item Number

    • C/O name
    • City
    • District
    • Postal Code
    • PO Box
    • Street
    • Building code
    • Floor
    • Country Key
    • Region
    • Telephone
  • Purchase Order Schedule - List of objects containing these fields:
    • PO Item Number
    • Schedule line number
    • Deliv. date category
    • Delivery Date
    • Scheduled Quantity
    • Time
    • Stat.-Rel. Del. Date
    • Purchase Requisition
    • Item of requisition

    • Handover Date
    • Handover Time
  • Additional Fields - Additional fields or values you want to add to the details. These fields are retrieved dynamically from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Outputs :

  • Purchase Order Data - Purchase order document details.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP S/4HANA - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error as returned from SAP S/4HANA - RFC in the RETURN object. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

 

To use this action, the corresponding SAP S/4HANA - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP_S4HANA_RFC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
